name: StrokeInfo
0:
”Alexa, open stroke info”
”Alexa, ask stroke info to what is secondary stroke prevention”
”Alexa, ask stroke info to why does strokes occur in young people”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stroke info
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stroke Info is one of the most comprehensive educational resources made for people affected by stroke or worried about it. Stroke Info is an idea of Atif Zafar, MD - a stroke neurologist and a physician leader - with the clear intent to educate the general public of the risk factors of stroke, how to prevent it from happening, the treatment options, side effects of medications commonly used in stroke care, rehabilitation queries and a lot more. Built-in a Question & Answer format for an interactive and educational experience. Please share your feedback at atif@doctorsmovement.com
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
